turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order some pizza from papa john

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is this for dinner

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes, but it is not a regular dinner

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: some kind of special event sir?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes, I am having to stop by my friend's birthday party, and I am responsible for pizza

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: how big is the party

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think about 20 people

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so how many pizza do you want to order

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: well, it is a potluck and everyone is supposed to bring something, so I am thinking five pizzas will do

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: the largest one possible

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: they have speical for buy one get one free, extra large

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: then let's get six for the price of three

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what flavor do you want

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want two meat lovers, two supreme, and two hawaiian

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hawaiian?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes, pineapple and ham

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: when do you want the pizza

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: at 6 this afternoon, so after we finish work in 15 minutes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and which pizza location do you want to pick them up

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: the closest one to our office

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the order is placed, the pizza will be ready for pick up in 25 minutes, I use the account we already have with them, details of the order is being sent to your phone

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: fantastic, thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you are very welcome
